name: Frog Token Worlds 2D (Demo)
description:
Controls:

  • A/D: Left and Right
  • S: Quick fall down
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Click: Attack

Objective:

Collect tokens, both XP and Frog tokens, while defending yourself from enemies! Gain experience to boost your skills to become the ultimate frog!

Frog Token Worlds 2D (Demo) is an action-arcade-RPG, where you are a frog that can explode enemies. This game inspired its 3D counterpart which has even more weapons and its own challenges! 

Try the newer 3D version of Frog Token Worlds HERE

https://frogtokenworlds.itch.io/frog-token-worlds
